text: Tapa'i bhanidinus ki ma ta timiharu jastai e'uta manisa hum tara ho, matira ‘‘vahya’’ avatarita garincha ki sabaiko puja yogya tyahi e'utai pujaniya cha. Ani juna manisale aphno aradhyasamga saksatkarako asa rakhdacha tyasala'i avasyaka cha ki asala karma garos ra aphno palanakartako pujama aru kasaila'i sajhedara nabano'os
